work.name: NavVis GmbH
work.summary: Development of image processing software with a focus on image quality. Used technologies being mostly C++ and Python.
highlights: Implementation of algorithms for processing of raw images.
Evaluation of image quality with respect to camera sensors and lenses as well as implementation of auto-exposure algorithms.
Implementation and evaluation of denoising algorithms.

work.name: Fraunhofer IKS
highlights: Implementation of autonomous driving scenarios in different simulators and tools (e.g CARLA and Scenic).
Implementation of deep learning based object detection algorithms (e.g YOLOv5) for the purpose of testing different research ideas.

work.name: Pionix GmbH
work.summary: Implementation of EV charging algorithms to optimize energy costs by balancing the usage of external grid energy and the energy that is locally generated with solar panels. Development of low-level communication protocols in C++ and Node.js, aimed at retrieving data from solar panels. Integration of these protocols into the internal software stack.
highlights: Implementation of EV charging algorithms
Development of low-level communication protocols in C++ and Node.js
Integration of protocols into the internal software stack

work.name: Zippia
work.summary: Worked on the backend of an API for a Chrome extension that supports users while filling job application forms. Set up data processing, ingestion, and monitoring pipelines, mostly using Apache Airflow. Involved in a diversified range of projects involving NLP and web scraping.
highlights: Backend development for a Chrome extension API
Data processing and monitoring pipeline setup with Apache Airflow
Projects involving NLP and web scraping

work.name: Bosch - Air Quality Solutions
work.summary: Statistical modelling and analysis applied to geospatial data in the field of traffic and air quality analysis. Developed a traffic scenario simulation optimization and a vehicular emission estimation model using machine learning and probabilistic programming. Managed and developed internal automation tools along with ETL pipelines. Developed efficient numerical methods for road network simplification and optimization.
highlights: Statistical modelling and analysis of geospatial data
Development of a vehicular emission estimation model
Management and development of internal automation tools and ETL pipelines
Numerical methods for road network optimization

work.name: 3P Tecnologia
work.summary: Developed algorithms to detect the presence of products on supermarket shelves using the OpenCV image processing software library. Implemented and validated Machine Learning/Deep Learning techniques.
highlights: Algorithm development for product detection on shelves
Application of OpenCV for image processing
Implementation of Machine Learning/Deep Learning techniques

volunteer.summary: Volunteered in an accessibility program that aimed to teach english to high school students

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
highlights: Quantum Teleportation
Quantum Cryptography
